_sText:
<center> * Surf_Syria_again * 

Well, here it is *cough* again *cough*

I decided to finally redo my previous map "Surf__Syria" because of some bugs that I discovered.

Many of these bugs were found thanks to beta testers, and helpful surfers.

Almost every level is retextured, and made slightly harder.

The two last levels have changed order.

The two last levels are pretty hard, cause some people thought it was way too easy.

Timer decreased from 8 minutes to 4 minutes.

All bugs should be fixed, if not report to me on steam: jolas

Jail is improved in many ways.

- Optmized even more.
- Removed the possibility of people getting away from the "cutters".
- Added system to reward you 10 kill points for beating the map.
- Gave you a m249/para gun if you wish to shoot the "losers"
- Changed the pink button to ornage (lol)
- That's all. :D

Hope you enjoy & Have fun on my map.
